info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 08 at 4:57PM EDT by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Wabash, northwestern Grant, Fulton, southern Kosciusko, Cass and Miami Counties through 545 PM EDT... At 457 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 9 miles west of Rochester to 7 miles southwest of Logansport. Movement was east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Logansport around 505 PM EDT. Rochester around 510 PM EDT. Walton around 515 PM EDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Grissom Afb, Peru, Akron, Bunker Hill and North Manchester. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
